meanings.definition: A plant of the mallow family with bell-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent1: The abutilon in the garden has beautiful bell-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted an abutilon in my backyard for its lovely bell-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent3: The abutilon tried to ring its bell-shaped flowers like an alarm clock.
meanings.sent4: The abutilon's bell-shaped flowers chimed softly in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant abutilon with its bell-shaped flowers stood out among the other plants.

meanings.definition: Any plant of the genus Abutilon.
meanings.sent1: I saw an abutilon at the botanical garden, a plant from the genus Abutilon.
meanings.sent2: The abutilon, a genus plant, thrived in the greenhouse.
meanings.sent3: The Abutilon family reunion included every plant from the genus.
meanings.sent4: The Abutilon plants in the garden were like a colorful family.
meanings.sent5: Each Abutilon plant in the greenhouse had its unique charm.

meanings.definition: A flowering plant commonly known as Indian mallow.
meanings.sent1: The abutilon, also called Indian mallow, bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Indian mallow, or abutilon, is a common sight in this region.
meanings.sent3: The Indian mallow and abutilon had a friendly competition for the best blooms.
meanings.sent4: The Indian mallow, known as abutilon, added a touch of exotic beauty to the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with the vibrant colors of the Indian mallow, or abutilon.
